page.title: 13Banking and Property.
page.content: There are two banks in Knebworth, Barclays and Lloyds. Because Knebworth is only a village both banks are only small branches and have a larger branch in Stevenage. Both banks are open during normal banking hours ie 9.30 am to 3.30 pm but do not have cash dispensers for out of business hours cash. There are also two Estate Agents in the village, John James and David Morris. Many people from the village go to one of these Estate Agents when they want to buy a house in the village. There are two Building Society Agents, one for the Abbey National Building Society and the other for the Halifax Building Society. There are two solicitors to complete the legal aspects of house buying as well as other legal matters.
